真言: (しんごん) - true word; mantra; Shingon (Sino-Japanese esoteric Buddhism, originating in the eighth century)
真言宗: (しんごんしゅう) - Shingon (Sino-Japanese esoteric Buddhism, originating in the eighth century)
真言神道: (しんごんしんとう) - Shingon Shinto; any branch of Shinto based on Shingon Buddhist teachings
真説: (しんせつ) - true theory; true teachings
真諦: (しんてい) - ultimate truth; essence (in Buddhism)
真賢木: (まさかき) - evergreen (esp. one planted or used at a shrine)
真贋: (しんがん) - genuineness or spuriousness; authenticity; the genuine and the spurious
真贋論争: (しんがんろんそう) - (yoji) argument as to (about) the authenticity (of...)
真赤な嘘: (まっかなうそ) - complete lie; outright lie
真近点離角: (しんきんてんりかく) - {astron} true anomaly
真逆: (まさか) - by no means/never!/well, I never!/you don't say!/certainly (not); something unexpected/emergency; currently/for the time being/presently/for now; indeed/really/truly/unexpectedly
真逆さま: (まさかさま) - headlong; head over heels
真逆様: (まさかさま) - headlong; head over heels
真部分集合: (しんぶぶんしゅうごう) - proper subset
真鍮鑞: (しんちゅうろう) - type of alloy of copper and zinc (brass) with zinc at about 33-67% used to solder metals like copper and iron
真険: (しんけん) - seriousness/earnestness; real sword (as opposed to unsharpened or wooden practice weapon)
真際: (まぎわ) - on the verge of; just before; on the point of
真面目: (まじめ) - diligent; serious; honest; sober; grave; earnest; steady
真面目さ: (まじめさ) - earnestness; solemnity; gravity; seriousness; soberness
真面目腐る: (まじめくさる) - to become extremely serious (in attitude); to look solemn; to assume a solemn air
真骨頂: (しんこっちょう) - showing one's true worth
真髄: (しんずい) - essence; quintessence; spirit; soul; heart; pith; pith and marrow
真魚箸: (まなばし) - type of long chopsticks used in the preparation of fish; type of long chopsticks used to hold the fish in carving knife ceremony
真魚鰹: (マナガツオ) - butterfish (any fish of family Stromateidae, esp. species Pampus punctatissimus); harvestfish; rudderfish
真鯛: (まだい) - tai (species of red Pacific sea bream, Pagrus major)
真鯵: (マアジ) - Japanese jack mackerel; Japanese horse mackerel (Trachurus japonicus)
真鰯: (マイワシ) - Japanese pilchard; Japanese sardine (Sardinops melanostictus)
真鰺: (マアジ) - Japanese jack mackerel; Japanese horse mackerel (Trachurus japonicus)
真鶸: (マヒワ) - Eurasian siskin (species of songbird, Carduelis spinus)
真麻: (カラムシ) - ramie (Boehmeria nivea var. nipononivea)
眠け覚し: (ねむけざまし) - cure for drowsiness
眠っている金: (ねむっているかね) - money lying idle
眠らす: (ねむらす) - to put to sleep; to kill
眠らせる: (ねむらせる) - to put to sleep; to kill; to leave unused
眠り: (nemuri) - sono, dormindo; inatividade, sono, dormindo; inatividade; morte
眠りから覚める: (ねむりからさめる) - to awake from one's sleep
眠りこける: (ねむりこける) - to sleep like a log; to sleep deeply
眠りこむ: (ねむりこむ) - to fall asleep; to sleep deeply
眠りにつく: (ねむりにつく) - to fall asleep
眠りに付く: (ねむりにつく) - to fall asleep
眠りに就く: (ねむりにつく) - to fall asleep
眠りに着く: (ねむりにつく) - to fall asleep
眠りに落ちる: (ねむりにおちる) - to fall asleep
眠り人: (ねぶりびと) - someone who is fast asleep
眠り薬: (ねむりぐすり) - sleeping powder; sleeping drug; narcotic; anaesthetic; anesthetic
眠り込む: (ねむりこむ) - to fall asleep; to sleep deeply
眠る: (ねぶる) - to sleep (not necessarily lying down); (ねむる only) to die; to close one's eyes
眠れる森の美女: (ねむれるもりのびじょ) - Sleeping Beauty (ballet)
眠気を誘う: (ねむけをさそう) - to induce sleep; to cause drowsiness
眠気覚まし: (ねむけざまし) - keeping oneself awake
眠鱶: (ネムリブカ) - whitetip reef shark (Triaenodon obesus, species of Indo-Pacific requiem shark)
眦: (せ) - Canto dos olhos, canto do olho
眦を決して: (まなじりをけっして) - with one's eyes flashing
眩い: (まばゆい) - dazzling; glaring; dazzlingly beautiful
眩う: (まう) - to be dizzy; to be vertiginous
眩く: (くるめく) - to spin/to revolve/to twirl; to be dizzy/to feel faint; to bustle about
眩ます: (くらます) - to dazzle; to make dizzy; to bewilder
眩む: (くらむ) - to be dazzled by/to be dizzied by/to be disoriented by; to be lost in (greed, lust, etc.); to become dark
眩めく: (くるめく) - to spin/to revolve/to twirl; to be dizzy/to feel faint; to bustle about
眩れる: (くれる) - to get dark; to end/to come to an end/to close/to run out; to be sunk (e.g. in despair)/to be lost
